title: How to Buy a Fortnite Account

steps.headline: Open BuyFortniteAccount.com in your internet browser.
steps.description: Type https://buyfortniteaccount.com into the address bar, and press ↵ Enter or ⏎ Return on your keyboard.

steps.headline: Click the type of account you want to buy on the menu bar.
steps.description: You'll find all four available types of Fortnite accounts you can buy on the navigation bar at the top. You can buy a Rare Costumes account, a Mystery account, a Rare Pickaxes account, or a Save the World account.

steps.headline: Select your platform on the left menu.
steps.description: Click Mobile, Nintendo Switch, PC, PlayStation 4, or Xbox One under the PLATFORM heading on the left-hand side of the page. This will filter all the available accounts in your selected account type, and only show the accounts you can play on your selected platform.

steps.headline: Select a costume or pickaxe category on the left menu (optional).
steps.description: If you're browsing the Rare Costumes or Rare Pickaxes accounts, you can select a costume or pickaxe category on the left menu to filter the accounts.

steps.headline: Click the account you want to purchase.
steps.description: Find an account you want to buy, and click on its picture or title to open the account details on a new page.

steps.headline: Click ADD TO CART on the details page.
steps.description: This is a blue button below the account title and description on the account details page. When you add an account to your cart, it'll show up on the right-hand side of the page.

steps.headline: Click the CHECKOUT button.
steps.description: This is a blue button on the right-hand side of the page. It will take you to the checkout page. If you want to view all the items in your cart, you can click VIEW CART here to open your shopping cart on a new page.

steps.headline: Enter your email address on the checkout page.
steps.description: Click the text field under "Email address" on the checkout page, and type your email address here to proceed with the checkout process. Your email address will be used as your billing address.

steps.headline: Click PROCEED TO PAYPAL.
steps.description: This is a blue button at the bottom of the "YOUR ORDER" box on the right-hand side. This option will also allow you to pay with your credit card if you don't have a PayPal account. Alternatively, you can select Cryptocurrencies here, and click PLACE ORDER to pay with BTC, LTC, ETH, XMR, XRP, BCH or other cryptocurrencies.

steps.headline: Sign in to your PayPal account.
steps.description: Enter your email address and password, and click the Log In button to sign in to your PayPal account. If you don't have a PayPal account, click Create an Account at the bottom of the sign-in form.

steps.headline: Confirm your payment on PayPal.
steps.description: Once you confirm your payment on PayPal, you'll be charged for the specified amount, and your new account's details will be sent to your email address. If you're not sure how to confirm your payment on PayPal, make sure to check out this article for more help.

steps.headline: Open PlayerAuctions.com in your internet browser.
steps.description: Type https://www.playerauctions.com into the address bar, and press ↵ Enter or ⏎ Return on your keyboard.

steps.headline: Hover over ALL GAMES on the top-left.
steps.description: This button looks like a blue gamepad icon near the upper-left corner of the page. It will open a menu panel.

steps.headline: Find and click Fortnite on the menu panel.
steps.description: Hover over "F", and click Fortnite to open a list of all the auctioned Fortnite items and accounts.

steps.headline: Click the Accounts tab on the Fortnite page.
steps.description: You can find this button in the upper-left corner of the auction listings. It will open a list of all the auctioned Fortnite accounts.

steps.headline: Click the blue DETAILS button next to an account.
steps.description: This will open the details of the selected account on a new page. If you're sure you want to buy the account without viewing the details, click the green BUY NOW button next to DETAILS.

steps.headline: Click the BUY NOW button on the details page.
steps.description: This is a green button on the right-hand side. It will open the login page.

steps.headline: Log in to your PlayerAuctions account.
steps.description: Enter your username or email and your password, and click the green LOG IN button. This will open your order summary. Alternatively, click Continue with Google or Continue with Facebook to sign in with your social media account. If you want to register and create a new account, click the green I WANT TO BUY button below the "New here?" heading on the top-left.

steps.headline: Click the Check out with PayPal button.
steps.description: This is a yellow button on the right-hand side. It will create your order, and take you to the payment page. Alternatively, you can click the GO COIN button to pay with cryptocurrencies, or SECURE CHECKOUT to pay with a credit card.

steps.headline: Click the green PAY NOW button.
steps.description: You can find it in the lower-left corner of your order status. This will redirect you to PayPal, and prompt you to confirm your payment.

steps.headline: Confirm your payment on PayPal.
steps.description: Once you confirm your payment, you'll be charged for the account's price on your selected payment method, and your new account's details will be sent to your email address. If you need help confirming your payment on PayPal, make sure to check out this article.
